summary: This document appears to be a legal acknowledgment related to the Articles of Incorporation in the Virgin Islands, involving several individuals. It includes the acknowledgment by a notary public, indicating the formal recognition of the document's execution.

persons.name: Paul Hoffman
persons.context: Paul Hoffman is mentioned as the notary public who acknowledged the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Barbara Mignon Weatherly
persons.context: Barbara Mignon Weatherly is one of the individuals who acknowledged the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Ena Simon
persons.context: Ena Simon is another individual who acknowledged the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Mary R. W
persons.context: Mary R. W is also mentioned as an individual who acknowledged the Articles of Incorporation.

keyFacts: The document is related to the Articles of Incorporation in the Virgin Islands.
It was acknowledged by a notary public, Paul Hoffman.
Three individuals, Barbara Mignon Weatherly, Ena Simon, and Mary R. W, are involved in the acknowledgment.
